function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne virus leakage from the drain due to poorly designed or maintained trap seal retention system.","Impact":"Introduces potentially lethal hazard during an airborne virus pandemic.","Mitigation":"Implement a well-designed and maintained trap seal retention system.","Technologies":"Advanced drainage system designs and maintenance technologies.","People":"Occupants of the space, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance team."},{"Description":"Lack of systematic guidance for drainage system operation and maintenance for infection control.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting respiratory viruses via the building drainage system.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement systematic guidance for infection control in drainage system operation and maintenance.","Technologies":"Infection control and sanitation protocols, advanced mapping technologies for sewage pipework.","People":"Facility management team, infection control experts.","Owner":"Health authorities, building management, infection control experts."},{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory viruses via contaminated indoor surfaces.","Impact":"Spread of respiratory viruses to individuals who come in contact with contaminated surfaces.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of shared indoor surfaces, and promoting good hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Cleaning and disinfection products, advanced cleaning equipment.","People":"Occupants of the space, cleaning and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management and cleaning services providers."}]}
